General.Name: Xiamen Jihong Package Technology Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Jihong Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the cross-border social e-commerce business in the Southeast Asia. It also provides blockchain and digital marketing services. In addition, it offers packaging products, such as color packing cartons, boxes, paper bags, QSR food grade packaging, cluster packaging products, and personalized packing products. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Jihong Package Technology Corp. and changed its name to Xiamen Jihong Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2019. Xiamen Jihong Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Xiamen, China.

3.Name: Ms. Hong Ying Gong
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. & Sec. of the Board
